DOC.brief_title: Irbesartan Versus Amlodipine : The OBI Study
DOC.detailed_description: Study Objectives 1 . Primary : - Reduction 24h BP obese hypertensive - Reduction arterial stiffness 2 . Secondary - Drug specific effect new onset diabetes - Drug specific effect reduction central fat deposition leptin adiponectin ratio Study design Study drug : Irbesartan 300mg vs. amlodipine 10mg Tx duration follow-up : 12 month Collected data : - 24h SBP DBP time 0 , 1 , 12 . - Pulse wave velocity time 0,1,12 . - Central obesity ( total , visceral , abdominal fat ) time 0,1,12 . - Leptin/adiponectin time 0,1,12 . - BMI , waist/hip ratio time 0,1 , 12 . - Glu , HbA1c , insulin time 0 , 1,12 . - K , Na , Cr , BUN , Chol , Tg , HDL , LDL , ALT , AST time 0 , 1,12 . Number patient : The reduction mean SBP expect 15 mmHg . Previous study group report 14mmHg SD mean SBP . The sample size require two side 5 % significance level 80 % power 40 patient ( Lehr 's formula ) Number center : 1
